ygData.subject: Re: Spell damage
ygData.msgSnippet: you re getting PARTIAL successes instead of COMPLETE failures (ie, resists).....consider yourself lucky. From:	Scott Murawski  on
ygData.messageBody:
you're getting PARTIAL successes instead of COMPLETE failures (ie,
resists).....consider yourself lucky.




From: Scott Murawski <scott@...> on 05/27/99 11:06 AM
PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Spell damage

From: Scott Murawski <scott@...>

I was playing yesterday and noticing something pretty bad.

Previously my chaotic feedback would always do 44 damage (when i was
lv9).
Now (lv10) when I was casting it on
mobs on wisp isle (non-wisp-mobs actually like snakes and spiders)
it does
almost like a random amount of damage.

One time it even did 3! which isn't a good ratio to 45 mana.
Another time it did 18 and concequently because of the low damage,
the
spider killed me. It only had a few pixels of health left too and
certainly 27 more damage would have killed it.

Has anyone else noticed this? Did I miss something along the line
of patches?

Thanks

Azboklin the enchanter
